When it comes to the cover, its only weakness is washing at high temperatures. Therefore, please set the water temperature to 30Â°C.
The cover could shrink at higher temperatures.
How to take care of hygiene in the pit?
To maintain perfect hygiene in the pit, you just need to wipe the cover with a wet cloth.
We know very well that your dog likes to dry itself with the pit coming back from a walk ğŸ˜»
In addition, we recommend to wash the cover every 2 weeks. Most of the dirt sets on it so cleaning is priority.
OxymeshÂ® filling prevents growth of bacteria inside the pit but if lots of fluid comes through the cover, it is worth to wash the mattress from inside.
For hygienic reasons, we recommend to wash the mattress with cold water every 2 months or if you notice that anything gets inside.
All you need is to wash the filling under shower or in a bath.
After washing you just need to beat OxymeshÂ® just like you beat a carpet.
This will help to get rid of the water drops trapped between the threads.
Finally, you just need to leave the mattress to dry.
Please do not leave it for a long time on the sun and do not place it directly against a very warmed radiator.
